pullrequest.title: Bullet: enable multiple friction directions, fix brittle JointDamping test (fix #479, #480)

content.raw:
It's not strictly necessary, but I did it because the empty PhysicsEngine::SetSeed didn't do anything, and I was trying to make sure that the derived class functions (e.g. ODEPhysics::SetSeed) would be called instead.

I can revert the deletion if we anticipate some utility for PhysicsEngine::SetSeed, but it seems to me like it all happens in the derived classes.
content.html:
It's not strictly necessary, but I did it because the empty PhysicsEngine::SetSeed didn't do anything, and I was trying to make sure that the derived class functions (e.g. ODEPhysics::SetSeed) would be called instead.

I can revert the deletion if we anticipate some utility for PhysicsEngine::SetSeed, but it seems to me like it all happens in the derived classes.
